title: What is Quantum Coaching and how can it help you achieve your potential?
first_phrase: This text discusses the concept of Quantum Coaching and the techniques used by a quantum coach to enhance creativity and problem-solving abilities in their clients. It explains that creativity is a quantum paradigm and cannot be developed by machines because it arises from deep areas of the mind that are normally unconscious. The text outlines a course in hypnosis, quantum thinking, and non-verbal communication that offers international certification in advanced hypnotherapy, mesmerism, and professional coaching. The last 200 tokens of the text discuss the Magnetic Massage, LuxMind and Quantum Psi technologies, quantum fields, and the benefits of becoming a coach that uses vital energy to create success.
